title: 'The candle of our homes are gone': Eight children killed after blast reduces Gaza flat to rubble
description: A man has painfully described how 10 members of his family were killed after an explosion reduced their flat to rubble - eight of whom were very young children.

title: World sees Palestinian deaths as not as important as Israeli deaths, says grieving dad in West Bank
description: I spent the afternoon in the West Bank with a father grieving the loss of his 17-year-old son who was shot by Israeli security forces on 8 October.

title: Britain has tilted its attention away from the Middle East - has Sunak neglected it at his peril?
description: The UK government is on a multi-pronged tour of the Middle East to prevent Israel's war against Hamas from spreading across the region.

title: MTV Awards called off due to security concerns amid Israel-Hamas war
description: The MTV Europe Music Awards ceremony has been cancelled due to security concerns "given the volatility of world events", organisers have announced.

title: Most distant cosmic phenomenon spotted by astronomers in a far-away galaxy
description: Astronomers have spotted the most distant fast radio burst (FRB) to date in a galaxy so far away that its light took eight billion years to reach Earth.

title: Number of Britons killed in Hamas attack rises to nine
description: The number of British people killed as a result of the Hamas attack on Israel has risen to nine, the prime minister's spokesperson has said.

title: While the world's eyes are elsewhere, there are significant developments in Ukraine
description: While the world focuses on what is happening in the Middle East, the war in Ukraine continues and there have been several significant developments over the past days.

title: Man accused of pretending to be mannequin to steal jewellery from shop
description: A man has been accused of pretending to be a mannequin in a shop window in the Polish capital Warsaw in order to steal jewellery.

title: The Israeli ground invasion into Gaza: When and how?
description: Britain's prime minister says the UK stands with Israel in its "darkest hour" as he met his Israeli counterpart, Benjamin Netanyahu.

title: 12-year-old Harry Potter fan found dead after Hamas attack
description: A 12-year-old Harry Potter fan and her grandmother have been found dead after the Hamas attack in Israel earlier this month.

title: France threatens 'little jokers' with prison after fake bomb threats close airports
description: France is threatening "little jokers" and "little clowns" with prison terms and big fines after fake bomb threats led to the cancellation of 130 flights and closed the Palace of Versailles three times in five days.

title: Russia charges journalist with being unregistered foreign agent
description: A Russian-American journalist has been detained in Russia and charged with failing to register as a foreign agent.

title: What is happening at the Gaza-Egypt border?
description: As state-sanctioned protests rage across the Arab world after the deadly al Ahli hospital explosion in Gaza, Egypt is no exception.

title: US shoots down drones targeting its troops in Iraq as regional tensions flare
description: Coalition forces have suffered minor injuries during drone attacks at US bases in Iraq, as regional tensions escalate following the deadly explosion at a hospital in Gaza.

title: 'The UK stands with you', Sunak says as he arrives for talks in Israel
description: The prime minister has told Israel "the UK stands with you" as he holds talks in Tel Aviv.

title: 'Genuinely nice bloke': Tributes paid to British businessman killed in Uganda honeymoon 'terror attack'
description: Tributes have been paid to a newlywed British businessman and his wife who were killed in a suspected terrorist attack while on honeymoon in Uganda.

title: More than 400 puppies and cats rescued after animal trafficking ring bust
description: More than 400 pets have been rescued from an illegal animal trade network in Spain.

title: Half-eaten great white shark washes up after suspected killer whale attack
description: The carcass of a great white shark has caused mystery in Australia, after it washed up on a beach appearing to have been the victim of a vicious attack.
